D

de.bcxp.challenge - package de.bcxp.challenge
The root package for the data challenge containing the entry point App and containing the resource files.
de.bcxp.challenge.analysis - package de.bcxp.challenge.analysis
Provides interfaces and classes for analyzing different types of documents, including CSV and JSON formats.

Provides CSV-specific document analyzers.
de.bcxp.challenge.documentParsing - package de.bcxp.challenge.documentParsing

Provides CSV-specific document parsing utilities.

Contains custom exceptions.
de.bcxp.challenge.model - package de.bcxp.challenge.model
Contains core data model classes used to represent documents.
de.bcxp.challenge.model.csv - package de.bcxp.challenge.model.csv
Contains CSV-specific DocumentEntry classes.
de.bcxp.challenge.utility - package de.bcxp.challenge.utility
General purpose utility classes.
Classes should all be final and declare a private constructor, since all classes should only provide static utility methods.

I

IDocumentAnalyser<T extends DocumentEntry> - Interface in de.bcxp.challenge.analysis
Defines a contract for analyzing a Document containing entries of type IDocumentAnalyser to determine the best matching entry based on a specific criterion.
IDocumentParser<T extends DocumentEntry> - Interface in de.bcxp.challenge.documentParsing
Interface for parsing a document from a given file path.
IEntryWithComparableNumericTuple - Interface in de.bcxp.challenge.model.csv
Functional interface providing a contract for an entry that can produce a numeric score for comparison purposes.

NumericComparisonType - Enum Class in de.bcxp.challenge.analysis.csv
